text:
[Verse]
Sun is shining up so high
Blue above we're in the sky
Feel the summer breezes blow
Letting all our troubles go

[Verse]
Walking beaches hand in hand
Footprints fading in the sand
Days of laughter nights of cheer
Moments made when you are near

[Chorus]
Oh these summer skies they call
Light up hearts where shadows fall
Every dream can touch the sun
In this world where we are one

[Verse]
Ice cream melting in the heat
Dancing to a happy beat
Water splashing cool and clear
Echoes of the joy we hear

[Bridge]
Seasons fade but memories stay
Carry warmth through winter's gray
Hold this light within your soul
Make it part of you whole

[Chorus]
Oh these summer skies they call
Light up hearts where shadows fall
Every dream can touch the sun
In this world where we are one
title: Summer Skies
